text: Iván Verebély (born Iván Weinberg 7 December 1937 - 23 September 2020) was a Hungarian actor and comedian. He was born in Budapest. He played in Miskolci Nemzeti Színház, Nemzeti Színház, and in Vidámszínpad. He appeared in the 2008 movie The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas. He gave the voice to Mayor Manx for the Hungarian dub of SWAT Kats: The Radical Squadron.
